contents: @sma18026: 我在互联网上搜索了一下，发现了川普的原始话："When Mexico sends it people, they're not sending their best. They're not sending you. They're sending people that have lots of problems, and they're bringing those problems with us. They're bringing drugs. They're bringing crime. They're rapists. And some, I assume, are good people"，我不认为这个很极端，而且这时候他还不是总统。
